Ex players - Associates.Name: Massimo Bartoletti
Ex players - Associates.position: Massimo Bartoletti is Associate Professor at the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science of the University of Cagliari. His research activity concerns the development of tools and techniques for the specification, analysis and verification of software, with a special emphasis on security. Massimo Bartoletti is founder of the laboratory "Blockchain@Unica",  one of the largest academic research group on blockchain technologies in Italy, director of a node of the Cyber Security National Lab for the University of Cagliari, and core member of the CINI working group on Blockchain.
